text: The 2020–21 Arminia Bielefeld season was the club's 116th season for the German football club Arminia Bielefeld. The season lasted from 1 July 2020 to 30 June 2021. ==Players== ===First-team squad=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===In=== Date Pos.
